dt-api.name: columns().dataSrc()
dt-api.summary: Get the data source property for the selected columns.

type.description: Get the data source property for the selected columns
type.returns: API instance with the result set containing the data source parameters for the selected columns as configured by `-init columns.data`

dt-api.description:
DataTables has the ability to read data from a variety of complex data sources through use of the `-init columns.data` option. This method provides the ability to retrieve that setting for multiple columns after initialisation based on a column selector (see `-type column-selector`).
The value of `-init columns.data` that was set during initialisation (including the default of a column index integer) will be returned by this method, including functions (unevaluated). It is important to note that how `-init columns.render` is set has no effect on the return value of this method, which is used only for retrieving the value of `-init columns.data`.
Generally the singular representation of this method, `-api column().dataSrc()`, is likely to be more useful for authors. This method is included for completeness in the API.
